name: Golden Tulip Amritsar

reviews.text: I stayed here for couple of days to visit the Golden temple and wagah border. This hotel was good and very comfortable. Helpful staff who are tourist friendly. Rooms are huge and well done. Feels quite luxurious and i would think this is great value for the price we pay. They also give complimentary pickup/drop to station etc.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would give the breakfast a miss here even though the spread is very good---this is nothing to do with this hotel but that the dhabas in Amritsar are just fabulous.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel with Better Service!!

reviews.text: My wife and I visited Amritsar to experience the wonderful Golden Temple and sought a hotel based on Tripadvisors recommendation. We arrived from Jalendar and the hotel lived up to the hype. Beautiful facilities, amazingly professional staff. God willing, we would gladly return to this property.
reviews.title: You will have an Awesome Stay at Golden Tulip

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel in March2012 for 2 nights and it was just so fabulous that this is our pre-decided destination hotel for all future trips to Amritsar. Hotel Staff is well behaved, professional and very hospitable. Best part was the terrace pool but since it was still quite cold in March month, we couldn't enjoy a dip but just relaxing by the pool had its holy effect on us. Kids really enjoyed the pastries at the Coffee Shop but the size is a tad bit big for 6 & 7 years old.
reviews.title: Decent choice

reviews.text: Location is good too as it takes just about 15-20min by car from the Railway Station. All in all a very good option if you're planning a quick trip to the city of the Golden Temple.
reviews.title: superb service , excellent hospitality

reviews.text: Stayed here for a night on 22 Dec 2012. The hotel was running full and we had managed to get 4 rooms from venere.com at close to the going rates. The exterior of the hotel and model town locality is a let down but once you step inside, it is certainly not bad. A well designed lobby with a coffee and pastry shop tucked in a corner.
reviews.title: A Very Good option

reviews.text: To go up to the rooms, we had 2 antique elevators from OTIS, little slow but good enough as the hotel is not a high-rise.
reviews.title: First choice in Amritsar.

reviews.text: Rooms were reasonably decent sized with clean beds, acceptable toilets. Good enough to spend the night as we were out of the hotel for most of the time.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Did not have breakfast as a local friend treated us to the most authentic Amritsari breakfast. But we had lunch at the hotel restaurant upon check-in. Food was good enough.
reviews.title: Close to the Golden Temple

reviews.text: I would certainly recommend this hotel to those visiting Amritsar if the purpose is a functional stay.
reviews.title: A decent value hotel

reviews.text: we did a short stay of 2 days at golden tulip.
reviews.title: good choice to stay at amritsar

reviews.text: The rooms were quite cosy and all the amenities were well provided.
reviews.title: Good experience

reviews.text: The restaurant was a bit expensive by amritsar standards .The quality and quantity of food made up for the bit of overcharging.
reviews.title: Great Stay!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location on GT road is a good advantage as taking local transport helps.
reviews.title: Value for money!

reviews.text: The hotel proided with a innova for airport pickup but I had to pay for it(they could provide a complimentary pick up and drop )
reviews.title: "NAMASKAR”
Value for money, good service
reviews.text: Although the interiors are a bit old and plaid, the amenities and service was excellent. The rooms were comfortable and toilets clean, though not luxurious. The breakfast buffet wasn't particularly impressive and we didn't really use any of the restaurants here but we heard good things about the Indian restaurant. For the price, highly recommended.

My dad stays here very regularly(4-5 times in a month). I came here for our family trip to amritsar and near by places. I find this hotel at par with * hotels, being from hospitality background, I could easily judge this hotel on grounds of service and overall ambience.
reviews.title: Value for money, seems to be best in Amritsar !

reviews.text: Courteous staff, nice ambience overall. Spacious rooms, 24hrs hot water supply. We went for dinner at the restaurant, the only thing that pinch is its music, that was quite loud and also they need to work little on their menu in regards to accompaniments and also to add some more varities. ( You will not find Sarso ka saag and Makke ki roti - being in the capital city of Punjab, very strange) which I had mentioned it comment card, hope they will take some remedial action. Also I"ll recommend if they can work little on their standard reciepes, in regards to authenticity.
reviews.title: Would stay here again.

reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was great ! Simply loved it. You will find everything.
reviews.title: Comfy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best part is, hotel will not deviate from any standards mentioned in their website and catalogue. 100% delivery of committment.
reviews.title: Average Hotel (Probably one the best in Amritsar)

description: One of the leading hotel chain worldwide “Golden Tulip Hotels Group” has set high International Standards world over and proved as a benchmark for other hotel brands as well.Golden Tulip Amritsar is a upscale 4 star hotel offering unique surroundings and décor providing a refreshing experience and exceptional service. All 52 rooms including 4 suites are one of the spacious rooms available in the city and have been tastefully designed.
